//Ragnus//

  Ragnus' scouting had proven useful after all, and now he wouldn't 
have to attack a whole base on his own to get it.  As he surveyed the 
area he saw the dragonlike figure of Shivah.

  Had he been in better mental condition he would have waited for a 
better time to attack.  

  But the fury of his psychosis was driving him now...

  ...so the giant red dragon flew in, full speed for the attack.
